entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 03:51 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
